originalText.text: Highly recommend Alex. I came with 2 brown boots that lost some of their color and Alex fixes them immediately with a smile, good conversation, and more than fair price.

text.text: Highly recommend Alex. I came with 2 brown boots that lost some of their color and Alex fixes them immediately with a smile, good conversation, and more than fair price.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Alex to anyone in need of shoe repair. I brought in a heel that needed to be reattached to a leather dress shoe, and it was fixed in under 5 minutes. I’m impressed by the speed and affordability of the whole experience and will definitely be back.

text.text: I highly recommend Alex to anyone in need of shoe repair. I brought in a heel that needed to be reattached to a leather dress shoe, and it was fixed in under 5 minutes. I’m impressed by the speed and affordability of the whole experience and will definitely be back.

originalText.text: If I could give this place Zero stars i would. My husband brought a new pair never worn YSL pumps to get rubberized soles and came home with a completely damaged torn patent leather pump. Now I understand mistakes happen but the complete dishonesty and lack of accountability is what was so shocking. When we noticed the tear we returned this morning asking why this wasnt brought to our attention during pickup and well as to see if anything could be done to fix the shoe. The owner proceeded to take no blame stating my shoe was too small to put on the machine so he had to do it by hand which lead to the tear and the best he could do was glue the tear down but there was nothing else he could do. Not only did he not offer to refund the $40 for his botched work he said he wouldn’t reimburse us for the actual cost of the shoe and that if we had an issue to “sue him” . He kept saying that he was a small business owner and things happen. Now we arent cold hearted people who wouldn’t be understanding but if he had been honest during pick up instead of hoping we wouldnt notice the situation could have been avoided. Instead he wanted to plat victim and even going to the lengths of saying “you can afford it”. Its disgusting and appalling that someone can operate a small business with no moral or ethics. Do not bring your business here not only because of the poor work but also because the owner is greedy, dishonest and zero integrity.

originalText.text: Consistently excellent place for shoe repair. I've taken several pairs of shoes and boots here for heel replacement and zipper repair; the work is always done well and holds up. The prices are fair and the service is quick. If you're in NYC and need to have a repair done this is a solid place to go.

text.text: Consistently excellent place for shoe repair. I've taken several pairs of shoes and boots here for heel replacement and zipper repair; the work is always done well and holds up. The prices are fair and the service is quick. If you're in NYC and need to have a repair done this is a solid place to go.

originalText.text: Alex is a true artisan. He does amazing things to boots, and at an astonishing price. If your shoes are too far gone, he’ll tell you. If you need an extra hole in your belt when you’re passing by on your way home, he’s got you. The first time I got a pair of shoes back from him, my roommates were so impressed that we took in almost every pair of shoes in the house within a week.
